'''1.8.2-pre2'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150120132547/https://mojang.com/2014/12/minecraft-1-8-2-pre1-christmas-gift-edition/|title=Minecraft 1.8.2-pre4 – Updated Christmas Gift Edition|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref> is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.2]], released on January 15, 2015. This is first pre-release released in 2015.

== Changes ==
'''[[Boat]]s'''
* Can now survive crashes at higher speeds.
